review_text: If you'd like a cheap place to spend the night this is the place to go! You can rent a tent for 200 php. It's pretty cheap

Very relaxing place. There's a lot of mangroves in the place. People in tyat place are hospitable

Nothing much to do besides camp under the night sky. There is a basic toilet and water provided. A lady who is the caretaker could cook for you, if you provide her with supplies.  A habal habal can bring you from the ferry to the campsite ‚Ä¶
Great place for camping, planting mangroves and recreation.
Affordable overnight for 100 pesos. Friendly staff. Will definitely be back.
peaceful silent place, but poor facility

Good for camping only unless you prefer swimming in shallow and muddy water. If planning on overnight, bring mosquito repellants. "Tag-nok" also known as Sand Flies leave bite marks which itches for days and leave a bad looking scar when scratched badly.
